mapper.sql: id, userId, orderInfoId, messageContent, backContent, doneContent, createTime, serviceState
mapper.insert: insert into t_orderinfo_money_question (id, userId, orderInfoId, messageContent, backContent, doneContent, createTime, serviceState) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,

mapper.update:
update t_orderinfo_money_question
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
orderInfoId = #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
messageContent = #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backContent = #{backContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doneContent = #{doneContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serviceState = #{serviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_orderinfo_money_question set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orderInfoId = #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messageContent = #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backContent = #{backContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doneContent = #{doneContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serviceState = #{serviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select question.*,orderinfo.Id orderId,orderinfo.OrderNo orderNo,userinfo.Name name,userinfo.Phone phone from t_orderinfo_money_question question LEFT JOIN t_userinfo userinfo ON question.userId = userinfo.Id left JOIN t_orderinfo orderinfo ON question.orderInfoId = orderinfo.Id where 1=1
and orderinfo.OrderNo LIKE concat ('%',#{orderNo},'%')
and userinfo.Phone LIKE concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and question.serviceState = #{serviceState}
